metadata.title: CVE-2016-4561 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the cgierror function in CGI.pmin ikiwiki before 3.20160506 might allow remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors involving an errormessage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4561` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 3.20180228-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20180228-1').
